context: Hi the Tony's are tonight have you seen The Greatest Showman (2017)

I'm looking for a movie to watch with monsters. For example, I loved Colossal (2017) . I have seen The Greatest Showman (2017) . It was great! Loved the music. I saw that recently, though, so I'm looking for something different.
Yes, very cute monster. I like that one. I also liked The Cabin in the Woods . It probably has more monsters than any other movie.
Chappie (2015) wasn't really about monsters, but it was good
I haven't heard of that. What is it about?
resp: I haven't seen The Cabin in the Woods . Chappie (2015) was about a robot. I'm into robots! I loved A.I. Artificial Intelligence (2001) and I, Robot (2004)
